column4: Hello, could someone help me please? I'm getting the "Video mode not supported" error at bootup. The solution should lie in the monitor HZ which I should be able to change through xorg.conf but there's nothing there.
use recovery mode, then run a dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
I went to the console (?) (ctrl+alt+f1) and typed "dpkg -reconfigure xserver -xorg" but nothing happened.
